GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 13 May 2024
Due  to  a  low-level  atmospheric  disturbance  in  the  vicinity  of  Sri  Lanka,  showery  condition  is
expected to be enhanced during the next few days.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in most provinces of the island after 1.00 p.m.
Heavy showers more than 100mm are likely at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa, Eastern, Southern
and Uva provinces.

S
howers may occur at Eastern and Southern provinces during the morning too.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and
in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.

G
eneral  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages  caused  by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
